name: Catwalk
description: A client-facing retail web portal for clothing and acessories. I made 'related products' carousels, keyboard-accessible modals, and a dark theme toggle. Built with React.

name: Atelier
description: A microservice API delivering user submitted questions and answers about specific clothing products. Built with Node.js, deployed on AWS.

name: Park Pack
description: An app to find the best time to visit your local dog park. Built with React using Docker,Firestore, and Positionstack API.

name: Fit Friends
description: An app that lets you challenge or work together with your friends to meet a workout goal, all while social distancing.

name: Three Column Cards
description: Responsive UI component for car rental products.
